response.original_title: O magas apo to Giousouroum xanahtypa
response.overview: The policeman Thomas Bourekas has calmed down since his twin brother, Vangos, is imprisoned. However, in his cell, Vangos has his well-known company of illegals as inmates. They found the company "Vagos Kombina" E.P.E. inside the cell and tricked the agathobiol prison guard Matsoukas to sneak them out every night. The company's illegal activity begins, and at the same time the policeman's headache begins...
response.title: O magas apo to Giousouroum xanahtypa
